name: Gospel Sunday in Harlem
description: Hear the Gospel music and see the Spirit come alive in the people of Harlem.  Visit First Corinthians Baptist Church.  This huge church, housed in an old movie palace, is known for its welcoming congregation (nearly 7,000 members), casual ambiance, energetic services and great music, particularly its choir. Services Sunday 7:30am, 9:30am and 11:30am.
